title: 奇思妙想 都说会哭的孩子有奶吃 郑州哭这么大声，会不会有新机会
content: 瞎想的 有没有可能触底反弹？还是说是个无底洞

node.name: apple
node.title: Apple
node.header: 设计了 Apple Watch，iPad，iPhone，iMac 及 MacBook Pro 等电子产品的美国公司。

title: IOS Airdrop 10 分钟限制将在明年向全球推送。
content:
Following the discovery, Apple has confirmed to Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman that it plans to introduce the “Everyone for 10 Minutes” setting globally beginning next year, replacing the existing “Everyone” option.

cite: https://www.theapplepost.com/2022/11/11/apple-to-rollout-new-everyone-for-10-minutes-airdrop-setting-next-year/amp/?utm_campaign=Twitter&utm_medium=twitter&utm_source=twitter
content_rendered:
Following the discovery, Apple has confirmed to Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman that it plans to introduce the “Everyone for 10 Minutes” setting globally beginning next year, replacing the existing “Everyone” option.

cite: https://www.theapplepost.com/2022/11/11/apple-to-rollout-new-everyone-for-10-minutes-airdrop-setting-next-year/amp/?utm_campaign=Twitter&utm_medium=twitter&utm_source=twitter
